description:
Immerse yourself in the sprawling universe of ""Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes"" with this exclusive set of wallpapers crafted by the legendary Junko Kawano. Kawano brings her iconic artistry and storytelling prowess to the fore, creating a mesmerizing backdrop for fans and newcomers alike. This special collection comprises three unique wallpapers, each embodying the spirit of adventure and a little bit more details from some of the heroes.
 
 This Collection includes the following:
3x Original Wallpapers by Junko Kawano

Details:
Artist: Junko Kawano
Format: Digital Download (1920x1080)
Compatibility: Desktop and Mobile Devices

*Please be aware that this set is included in the Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes - Digital Deluxe Edition and Season Pass.
 *Please be careful not to purchase multiple times accidentally.
name: Exclusive Junko Kawano Wallpaper Collection
